entries.next: I just need to time my departure to get away from here. I don't need any help right now.
entries.cantwork: Oh. Hello. If, uh, if you're not with Borvo the Hutt, can I ask you to check with me here? When you're not so busy? If you're not with Borvo.
entries.npc_reset_1: Oh. Well, uh, okay. I hope you'll check back when you're ready.
entries.notyet: Sorry, I'm too busy to talk to you right now.
entries.npc_1_1: Uh, hello -- I think. You're not with Borvo the Hutt, are you? I ask because I wrote that poem, "Borvo's Other Nose." If you're not with Borvo, I have a job for you. Borvo has learned I'm the one responsible for that satire, and he's ordered thugs all over Naboo to look for me. I just heard that a thug has checked my vacation cabin. He must have found records of my purchases at this cafe, because he's headed this way. Stop him!
entries.npc_2_1: Oh, good. My informant says the thug was last seen at these coodinates in the wilderness. After you stop him, check back here.
entries.npc_3_1: No? Oh. Well, uh, thanks anyway. I'll try to find someone else to save my life.
entries.npc_4_1: Well, uh -- Borvo didn't like the poem's criticism of his wardrobe and general taste. And I also made certain corrupt officials look bad for dealing with Borvo. That ended a few careers. Borvo had to start over. Now he wants revenge. Can I count on you to stop him?
entries.npc_backtowork_1: I, uh, don't know what else to tell you. I wish you'd get started.
entries.npc_reward_1: That's a relief. I think you've earned this reward. Borvo doesn't give up easily, though, so I should have more work for you soon.
entries.npc_work_1: You, uh -- you didn't do the job yet? Oh. Okay. Hope you can keep going with that.
entries.npc_noloc_1: Good. I'm waiting for my informant to tell me the thug's current coordinates. Check with me soon.
entries.npc_failure_1: Oh, no. You didn't stop that thug? Oh, great. Well, I hope I can find someone else to do the job before he storms through that door.
entries.otherescort_1: You got the wrong guy, buddy. Goodbye.
entries.dontknowyou_1: You got the wrong guy, buddy. Goodbye.
entries.npc_breech_1: You working for that poet? You're not any more.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.npc_1_2: Uh, hello. The thug you stopped before stole my latest satire from my cabin. He gave it to a couple of his buddies to take to Borvo. This manuscript was, unfortunately, even more caustic than the first. Discretion moved me to suppress it. If Borvo sees it, he'll redouble his efforts. Get it back!
entries.npc_work_2: You, uh -- you didn't do the job yet? Oh. Okay. Hope you can keep going with that.
entries.otherescort_2: No business for you around here, buddy. Go away.
entries.dontknowyou_2: No business for you around here, buddy. Go away.
entries.npc_breech_2: You work for the guy that wrote this trash? You're about to regret it.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.npc_1_3: Hello again. My beloved wife, Sindria, can't visit me too often without tipping off my location to observers. But she makes frequent visits to the image designers to assume new disguises. She's just changed her appearance again -- don't know what she looks like now -- but she's waiting in the wilderness at the usual rendezvous. Can you escort her here?
entries.npc_work_3: You, uh -- you didn't do the job yet? Oh. Okay. Hope you can keep going with that.
entries.player_reset_3: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_3: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.npc_1_4: Oh, this is bad! I just learned -- oh, uh, sorry. Hello. Anyway, I just learned Borvo has kidnapped my pet monkey-lizard, Giggler. He's probably using poor Giggler as bait to trap me. But it won't work! I'll out-think him! I'll -- well, can I hire you to take care of this? Bring Giggler back safely, I mean?
entries.npc_work_4: You, uh -- you didn't do the job yet? Oh. Okay. Hope you can keep going with that.
entries.otherescort_4: Heek! Yeek! Not me. Not here. Go 'way.
entries.dontknowyou_4: Heek! Yeek! Not me. Not here. Go 'way.
entries.npc_breech_4: Yik-yik! Here I am! You! Over here, heee heee!
entries.player_reset_4: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_4: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_5: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_5: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_6: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_6: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.npc_reset_2: Oh. Well, uh, okay. I hope you'll check back when you're ready.
entries.npc_reset_3: Oh. Well, uh, okay. I hope you'll check back when you're ready.
entries.npc_reset_4: Oh. Well, uh, okay. I hope you'll check back when you're ready.
entries.npc_reset_5: Oh. Well, uh, okay. I hope you'll check back when you're ready.
entries.npc_reset_6: Oh. Well, uh, okay. I hope you'll check back when you're ready.
